Query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `users` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(1000) NULL , `email` VARCHAR(1000) NULL , `mobile` BIGINT NULL , `role` VARCHAR(100) NULL , `profilepic` VARCHAR(500) NULL , `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , `password` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , `createdby` INT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;INSERT INTO `users` (`name`,`email`,`mobile`,`role`,`password`) SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'Mayur Mhatre', 'mhatre975@gmail.com', 9768241151,'Superadmin','fcc8473853da748fe0a4d78df69459ae') AS tmp WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM `users` WHERE `email` = 'mhatre975@gmail.com' AND `mobile` = 9768241151) LIMIT 1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `hotel_master` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(1000) NULL , `addressline1` VARCHAR(5000) NULL , `addressline2` VARCHAR(5000) NULL , `area` INT NULL , `city` INT NULL , `state` INT NULL , `country` INT NULL , `pincode` VARCHAR(10) NULL , `description` VARCHAR(10000) NULL , `checkin_time` VARCHAR(20) NULL , `checkout_time` VARCHAR(20) NULL , `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , `created_by` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `created_date` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `hotel_master`  ADD IF NOT EXISTS `longitude`  DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL  AFTER `pincode`,  ADD IF NOT EXISTS `latitude`  DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL  AFTER `longitude`;ALTER TABLE `hotel_master` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `email`  VARCHAR(2000) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `created_date`, ADD IF NOT EXISTS `mobile1`  BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `email`, ADD IF NOT EXISTS `mobile2`  BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `mobile1`, ADD IF NOT EXISTS `landline1`  BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `mobile2`, ADD IF NOT EXISTS `landline2`  BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `landline1`, ADD IF NOT EXISTS `website`  VARCHAR(1000) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `landline2`, ADD IF NOT EXISTS `bannerimg`  VARCHAR(1000) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `website`, ADD IF NOT EXISTS `gstin` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `bannerimg`, ADD IF NOT EXISTS `aminities` VARCHAR(5000) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `gstin;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `hotel_pics` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `hotelid` INT NULL , `filename` VARCHAR(400) NULL , `description` VARCHAR(5000) NULL , `createdby` INT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `hotel_aminity_assign` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `hotelid` INT NULL  DEFAULT NULL ,`roomid`  INT NULL  DEFAULT NULL,`amintyid`  INT NULL  DEFAULT NULL, `createdby` INT NULL  DEFAULT NULL, `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `hotel_reviews` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `hotelid` INT NULL , `reviewedby` INT NULL , `review` FLOAT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `hotel__aminities_reviews` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `hotelid` INT NULL , `reviewedby` INT NULL , `reviewfor` INT NULL , `review` FLOAT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `hotel_likes` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `hotelid` INT NULL , `likedby` INT NULL , `like` INT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `hotel_rooms` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `hotelid` INT NULL , `room_type` VARCHAR(1500) NULL , `rooms_count` INT NULL , `description` VARCHAR(5000) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `price` DOUBLE NULL , `discounted_price` DOUBLE NULL , `cgst` DOUBLE NULL , `sgst` DOUBLE NULL , `igst` DOUBLE NULL , `createdby` INT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `hotel_rooms` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `capacity`  BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `description`, ADD IF NOT EXISTS `aminities`  VARCHAR(5000) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `capacity`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `hotel_review_items` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(1000) NULL , `hotelid` INT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `hotel_room_photos` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `hotelroomid` INT NULL , `hotelid` INT NULL , `filename` VARCHAR(500) NULL , `description` VARCHAR(5000) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `hotel_aminities` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `amenity` VARCHAR(500) NULL , `amenity_icon` VARCHAR(100) NULL , `createdby` INT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `hotel_subaminities` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `hotelid` INT NULL , `aminityid` INT NULL , `name` VARCHAR(500) NULL , `createdby` INT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `hotel_booking` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `hotelid` INT NOT NULL , `hotelroomid` INT NOT NULL , `adults` INT NOT NULL , `childrens` INT NOT NULL , `rooms` INT NOT NULL , `checkin_date` INT NOT NULL , `checkout_date` INT NOT NULL , `offers` INT NOT NULL , `amount` INT NOT NULL , `grossamount` INT NOT NULL , `cgst` INT NOT NULL , `sgst` INT NOT NULL , `igst` INT NOT NULL , `netamount` INT NOT NULL , `memberid` INT NOT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `members` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(150) NULL , `email` VARCHAR(1000) NULL , `mobile` BIGINT NULL , `password` VARCHAR(20) NULL , `fbdetails` VARCHAR(10000) NULL , `googledetails` VARCHAR(10000) NULL , `profilepic` VARCHAR(500) NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `access_token` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `token` VARCHAR(500) NULL , `key` VARCHAR(100) NULL ,`createdby` INT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `states` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`name` varchar(30) NOT NULL,`country_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB  DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 AUTO_INCREMENT=4121 ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cities` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`name` varchar(30) NOT NULL,`state_id` int(11) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB  DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 AUTO_INCREMENT=47577 ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `areas` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(500) NULL, `stateid` INT NULL, `cityid` INT NULL,`createdby` INT NULL, `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `countries` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`sortname` varchar(3) NOT NULL,`name` varchar(150) NOT NULL,`phonecode` int(11) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB  DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=249 ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vehical` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `company` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `model` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `passingno` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `cpacity` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL, `color` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `time_period` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `price` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL, `discounted_price` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL, `description` VARCHAR(5000) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `coverpic` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `cgst` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL, `sgst` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL, `igst` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL, `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL, `createddate` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vehical_pics` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `vehicalid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,`coverpic` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL, `createddate` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP  , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `vehical_pics` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `description`  VARCHAR(5000) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `coverpic`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vehical_docs` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `vehicalid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,`docname` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL,`docimg` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL, `createddate` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP  , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vehical_booking` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `vehicalid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL, `memberid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,`idproof` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `bookingdate` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,`bookingtime` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `bookstatus` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,  `returndate` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,`returntime` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `returnstatus` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL, `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL, `createddate` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `updatedby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL, `updateddate` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP  , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `cruze` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(1000) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `description` VARCHAR(7000) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `services` VARCHAR(5000) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `price` BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `discounted_price` BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `igst` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `cgst` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `sgst` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `capacity` BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `cruze`  ADD IF NOT EXISTS `coverpic`  VARCHAR(1000) NULL DEFAULT NULL  AFTER `capacity`;ALTER TABLE `cruze` ADD  IF NOT EXISTS `deletestatus` INT NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `coverpic`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cruzetimeslots` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `cruzeid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `timeslot` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `closingtime` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS `cruzegallery` ( `id` INT NOT NULL , `cruzeid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `filename` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `cruzegallery`  ADD IF NOT EXISTS `description`  VARCHAR(5000) NULL DEFAULT NULL  AFTER `filename`;ALTER TABLE `cruzegallery` CHANGE `id` `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cruzebooking` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `cruzeid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `timeslote` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `members` BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `picuplocation` VARCHAR(5000) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `vegmeal` BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `nonvegmeal` BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `unitprice` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `grossamt` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `taxamt` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `netamt` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `memberid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `approvelstatus` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `approvedby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , `approvaldate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cruz_services` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `cruzid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `servicename` VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL , `description` VARCHAR(5000) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cruz_booking_services` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `cruzid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `bookingid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `servicename` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `servicevalue` VARCHAR(5000) NULL DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `experience_likes` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `expid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `memberid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `like`  INT NULL DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `experience_likes` ADD  IF NOT EXISTS `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AFTER `like`

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `experience_review` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `expid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `memberid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `comment` VARCHAR(5000) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `experience_review` ADD  IF NOT EXISTS `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AFTER `comment`
